languages.text: Блюститель, попытавшийся исполнить приказ, навел оружие на слепца, но тут же пал наземь и зашелся в вопле боли. Разум его был искалечен психическим криком старика. Такое повторилось второй раз, и третий...

An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...
languages.original_text: Блюститель, попытавшийся исполнить приказ, навел оружие на слепца, но тут же пал наземь и зашелся в вопле боли. Разум его был искалечен психическим криком старика. Такое повторилось второй раз, и третий...

traits.locale_text: An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...

An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was maimed by the old man's psychic whisper. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...

An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...

languages.text: Un guardia que intentó seguir órdenes apuntó al ciego con su arma, pero cayó al suelo al instante, aullando de dolor. Su mente sufrió la devastación del chillido psíquico del hombre. Un segundo intento tuvo el mismo resultado, al igual que el tercero...
languages.original_text: An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...

traits.locale_text: Un guardia que intentó seguir órdenes apuntó al ciego con su arma, pero cayó al suelo al instante, aullando de dolor. Su mente sufrió la devastación del susurro psíquico del hombre. Un segundo intento tuvo el mismo resultado, al igual que el tercero...

languages.text: 命令に従おうとしたエンフォーサーは、盲目の男に武器を向けるが、痛みに泣き叫びながらバタッと床に倒れ込む。彼の精神は、盲目の男の超能力の叫びでズタズタにされたのだ。2回目の挑戦も、3回目の挑戦も結果は同じだった…
languages.original_text: An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...

traits.locale_text: 命令に従おうとしたエンフォーサーは、盲目の男に武器を向けるが、痛みに泣き叫びながらバタッと床に倒れ込む。彼の精神は、盲目の男の超能力の囁きでズタズタにされたのだ。2回目の挑戦も、3回目の挑戦も結果は同じだった…

languages.text: 其中一位执法者将武器对准了那个盲人，试图执行命令，但却立刻倒在了地上，痛苦地哀嚎起来——盲人充满灵能力量的尖叫声撕裂了他的意识。第二位执法者也落得了同样的下场，随后是第三位……
languages.original_text: An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...

traits.locale_text: 其中一位执法者将武器对准了盲人，试图执行命令，但却立刻倒在了地上，痛苦地哀嚎起来——盲人充满灵能力量的低语撕裂了他的意识。第二位执法者也落得了同样的下场，随后是第三位……

languages.text: Ein Enforcer, der versuchte, seine Befehle zu befolgen, zielte mit seiner Waffe auf den Blinden, brach aber augenblicklich vor Schmerzen schreiend auf dem Boden zusammen. Sein Verstand wurde von den psionischen Schreien des Mannes zerstört. Ein zweiter Versuch verlief ebenso, dann ein dritter ...
languages.original_text: An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...

traits.locale_text: Ein Enforcer, der versuchte, seine Befehle zu befolgen, zielte mit seiner Waffe auf den Blinden, brach aber augenblicklich vor Schmerzen schreiend auf dem Boden zusammen. Sein Verstand wurde von dem psychischen Geflüster des Mannes zerstört. Ein zweiter Versuch verlief ebenso, dann ein dritter ...

languages.text: Un prévôt qui vient de mettre l'aveugle en joue comme il lui a été ordonné s'effondre soudain au sol en gémissant de douleur, l'esprit ravagé par le cri psychique du vieillard. Il en est de même pour le deuxième qui pointe son arme sur lui, puis pour le troisième...
languages.original_text: An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...

traits.locale_text: Un prévôt qui vient de mettre l'aveugle en joue comme il lui a été ordonné s'effondre soudain au sol en gémissant de douleur, l'esprit ravagé par le murmure psychique du vieillard. Il en est de même pour le deuxième qui pointe son arme sur lui, puis pour le troisième...

languages.text: Emirlerini yerine getirmeye çalışan bir infazcı, kör adama silahını doğrulttu. Ancak bu hareketi, yalnızca acı içinde inleyerek kendini yerde bulmasına neden oldu. Zihni, adamın ruhsezi çığlığıyla perişan olmuştu. İkinci girişimi de aynı şekilde sonlandı, ardından üçüncü kez denedi...
languages.original_text: An enforcer who tried to follow his orders aimed his weapon at the blind man, only to collapse on the floor at once, wailing in pain. His mind was ravaged by the man's psychic scream. A second attempt went the same way, then a third one...
